ComicInfo.Summary:
After the shocking conclusion of Shattered Grid , the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers are still picking up the pieces. Meanwhile, Rita Repulsa sets into motion a plan to retrieve an artifact that might be the key to besting Zordon and the Rangers once and for all...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Cover | Dan Mora | 1 | B | Mix Variant Cover (Pink Ranger) | Miguel Mercado | 2 | Sub | Pre-Order Variant Cover | Audrey Mok (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 3 | Var | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover (Homage) | Natacha Bustos (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:25 Retailer Incentive Movie Variant Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Can't Hardly Wait.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-18 00:40:36. [CVDB688180]
